title: What Made Me Love You?
description: Helen, the Witch Queen, has plans for her son, Matt. Luckily for him, he is the only man in the world immune to magic.When he meets Teri, though, he succumbs to the deepest magic of all: the kind in a pair of deep, green eyes.Little Teri doesn't fit into Witch Queen Helen's plans, and when she learns of Matt's plans for Valentine's Day, Helen lets Hell loose.
author: Scott Bury
